1. Minimum C grade in MTH101A and MTH102A

2. Preference will be given to students who wish to take this course as an ESO over students who wish to take this as an OE

3. Preference will be given to Y14 students over Y15 students

4. Preference for the departments will be as follows (descending order) – ECO, CHM, BSBE, PHY, ME, AE, EE, CSE, MTH

5. Preference will be for students with higher CPI

title: MATHEMATICS FOR COMPUTER SCIENCE
instructor_notes: This is a compulsory course of CSE MTech/PhD students. BTech students will not be allowed to register for this course.

title: PRINCIPLES OF PROGRAMMING LANGAUGES
instructor_notes:
I plan to follow the book 

    Type and Programming Languages
       by 
    Benjamin pierce

 for most part of the course. 

 Before commencing on the book, we will acquire 
 a working knowledge of ML quickly. 

The course will emphasize "principles and foundations"
rather than being an introduction to programming in 
different paradigms. Overall flavour will be  
programming language theory.

For this purpose, please meet me in the beginning of the next semester.

thanks and regards,

-Surender Baswana
